name: Blockslayer
description:
Blockslayer

A Breakout/Soulslike mashup created in a weekend for MiniJam 71. I really couldn't fit this one with the (optional) theme "Puzzles", but I stuck to the limitation of combining multiple genres.

Controls

Arrow keys to move the paddle/dodge, [z] to launch/attack.

Stuff I didn't get around to
  • Sound and music
  • Equipment
  • Enemy variety
  • Polish
  • Balance
